https://tmrev.io/movie/262942-A Boy Named Sue 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9uTNEluw8FAos3trAXqE7ffllZq.jpg A Boy Named Sue chronicles the transformation of a transsexual named Theo from a woman to a man over the course of six years. Following Theo's physiological and psychological changes during the process, as well as their effects on his lesbian lover and community of close friends, A Boy Named Sue tells a story about gender identity, relationships, and how even things that seem permanent can change. A Boy Named Sue
